angry: I would recommend listening to the song "Irresistible" by Fall Out Boy. The high-energy rock sound and intense lyrics may help channel some of that anger and frustration.
happy:
Song: "My Happy Ending" by Avril Lavigne
Artist: Avril Lavigne

Note: Avril Lavigne is not a grunge artist, but "My Happy Ending" has a happy vibe and was released in the 2000s, making it a suitable recommendation for a great day.
tired: A great song and artist to listen to in this situation would be "King of the Beach" by Wavves. Wavves is an American rock band known for their surf rock style and energetic music, which could help lift the mood and provide a much-needed energy boost.
